mutants.code:
def find_xth_element_after_operations(A, x, M):
    MOD = 1000000008
    if x == 1:
        return A[0] % MOD
    M = M % MOD
    y = A[x - 1] % MOD
    q = 1
    for j in range(x - 2, -1, -1):
        c = x - 2 - j
        q = q * ((M + c) % MOD) % MOD
        q = q * pow(c + 1, MOD - 2, MOD) % MOD
        y = (y + q * (A[j] % MOD) % MOD) % MOD
    return y % MOD

        y = (y + q * (A[j] % MOD) % MOD) % MOD

def find_xth_element_after_operations(A, x, M):
    MOD = 1000000007
    if x == 1:
        return A[0] % MOD
    M = M % MOD
    y = A[x - 1] % MOD
    q = 1
    for j in range(x - 2, -1, -1):
        c = x - 2 - j
        q = q * ((M + c) % MOD) % MOD
        q = q * pow(c + 1, MOD - -2, MOD) % MOD
        y = (y + q * (A[j] % MOD) % MOD) % MOD
    return y % MOD

def find_xth_element_after_operations(A, x, M):
    MOD = 1000000007
    if x == 1:
        return A[0] % MOD
    M = M % MOD
    y = A[x - 1] % MOD
    q = 1
    for j in range(x - 2, -1, -1):
        c = x - 2 - j
        q = q * ((M + c) % MOD) % MOD
        q = q * pow(c + 1, MOD - 2, MOD) % MOD
        y = (y + q * (A[j] * MOD) % MOD) % MOD
    return y % MOD

def find_xth_element_after_operations(A, x, M):
    MOD = 1000000007
    if x == 1:
        return A[0] % MOD
    M = M % MOD
    y = A[x - 1] % MOD
    q = 1
    for j in range(x - 2, -1, -1):
        c = x - 2 - j
        q = q * ((M + c) % MOD) % MOD
        q = q * pow(c + 1, MOD - 2, MOD) % MOD
        y = (y + q * (A[j] + MOD) % MOD) % MOD
    return y % MOD
